post_content: Quick question, did you try to get the scott card graded with psa by chance?  Thanks and if not do you think it could get a 1?

[quote name="BMB Cards" post=2473019]Quick question, did you try to get the scott card graded with psa by chance?  Thanks and if not do you think it could get a 1?[/QUOTE]

I have not attempted to grade either. Scott is authentic and would have a chance of receiving an A or 1, but I wouldn’t be surprised if it came back A.
